meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Roger Craig Mark Runsvold Joon Pahk Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6245.

td.p: Roger Craig, a computer scientist from Newark, Delaware
Mark Runsvold, a student and waiter from Moscow, Idaho
Joon Pahk, a college physics teacher from Somerville, Massachusetts

tr.td: THE QUOTABLE CHURCHILL
ON THE MOVIE SOUNDTRACK
GAELIC PRIDE
WHAT'S THAT ON YOUR HEAD?
REAL LANDS
FICTIONAL LANDS
(Alex: And we want you to name the author who created those fictional lands.)

JoonRoger
Triple Stumper
')

tr.td: Joon
Mark
Roger

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Joon
Mark
Roger
ETHICS
FOOD SCIENCE
TERMS OF ART
SILENT-LETTERED WORDS
RUSSIA THEN & NOW
PUTTING CELEBRITIES ON THE MAP
(Alex: By adding just one letter, we'll be [*]. Let me give you an example of what might be a response in that category. "Who is Miley Cyprus?"--not Miley Cyrus.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Joon
Mark
Roger
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: To succeed on this Final, you have to think back to your math classes in high school.)
...
(Alex: I said you had to think back to math... [*] is 3.14159265, and that has to do with the number of shares.)
...
(Alex: Enjoy the weekend, because you come back on Monday to play against these two guys...)
(Tom: Tom Nissley, Seattle, Washington.)
(Buddy: Buddy Wright, Fort Worth, Texas.)
(Alex: It\'s gonna be a great final for one quarter of $1 million.)
JoonWhat is Apple pie?
$138
MarkWhat is Toronto search?
$12,345
RogerWhat is Yahoo???
$0
pi')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'A 2005 sale of 14,159,265 shares prompted the headline "Google offers shares, seeks global piece of" this')

tr.td: BUSINESS
A 2005 sale of 14,159,265 shares prompted the headline "Google offers shares, seeks global piece of" this
Joon
Mark
Roger
2nd place: $10,000
3rd place: $10,000
Finalist
Joon
Mark
Roger

21 R
(including 3 DDs),
6 W
